name: Marvel Comic Style Bear
description:
***CLEARANCE SALE- SHOULD BE £35!***

2 AVAILABLE

The images shown are of the fabric cut into the Prettily Stitched Bear pattern. I will be making these as and when i get chance, or as soon as you decide you want this little one to be born and sent to his new home with you! Please allow 7-10 days after purchase for your Bear to arrive.

This AWESOME Marvel Themed fabric with make any self-confessed Comic Book geek extremely happy! It will become a very cool handmade bear with button details. This little one is fully jointed, and sits approx 12" tall when sitting.

Please note, this is a collectable item and is not suitable for children under the age of 14.

name: Cream & Pink with Roses Bear
description:

This beautiful fabric is cream with a soft pink checked pattern, complete with hearts and roses. It will become a beautiful handmade bear with lovely button details, and a satin bow. This little one is fully jointed, and sits approx 12" tall when sitting.

Please note, this is a collectable item and is not suitable for children under the age of 14.
